body:
Hi Waldo,


Raphael's answer is correct, but if you need a material that is 
completely transparent instead of a void surface, use the following 
specification, instead:


void trans completely_clear
0
0
7 1 1 1 0 0 1 1


-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2003-September/000998.html).</sup>
